text: Hardas is a village in Kargil district of the Indian union territory of Ladakh. The village is located 10 kilometres from the district and tehsil headquarters Kargil. ==Demographics== According to the 2011 census of India, Hardas has 233 households. The literacy rate of Hardas village is 76.24%. In Hardas, Male literacy stands at 87.86% while the female literacy rate was 64.25%. {| class="wikitable sortable" |+ Demographics (2011 Census) ! !! The next nearest major airports are Srinagar International Airport and Leh Airport located at a distance of 219 kilometres and 225 kilometres. ==See also== *Ladakh *Kargil *Hunderman ==References== Category:Villages in Kargil tehsil
